name: Midnight Explorers
description:
SUMMARY

"The long abandoned Kenton Estate was claimed by many to be haunted. Tonight, the brave crew of Midnight Explorers will find out the truth behind this sinister place... Be sure to like and subscribe to our channel!"

FEATURES

  • 1-3 hours of play time
  • Multiple puzzles to solve
  • Discover the haunted manor's backstory via scattered files and clues 
  • Beware of 'things' lurking behind the next room...
  • 3 endings
  • Atmospheric soundtrack

TIPS:

(Note: It is advised to explore the game yourself. However, you are free to refer to these tips if you're stuck.)

  • Items and some interactive objects will emit a small flash of light. Keep your eyes peeled!
  • Lit candles and lanterns can help you get oriented
  • Item descriptions are helpful!
  • The shotgun will be used (or fired) automatically when the enemy approaches, no equipping or interaction required
